newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Merrill on Dollar General.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Merrill on Dollar General.

text.p: Merrill Lynch analyst Dan Barry cited Dollar General Corp's recent stock price slide as one reason to buy the stock.
-- Said in a research note the stock dipped after the retailer announced some changes in its merchandise mix to consumables and basic apparel, and experienced some temporary distribution problems.
-- Barry expects the merchandise changes to improve same-store sales in the second half of this year.
-- Cited the company's expansion plans to 375-400 new stores this year from 350 units, as well as expansion and upgrading of its distribution centers.
-- Merrill named it as Focus One stock.
